Package org.openwms.core.preferences.impl.mongodb

package org.openwms.core.preferences.impl.mongodb
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.openwms.core.preferences.impl
    Contains the internal implementation of the component.
    org.openwms.core.preferences.impl.events
    Contains types that are responsible to deal with events.
    org.openwms.core.preferences.impl.file
    Contains types working with a file based implementation.
    org.openwms.core.preferences.impl.jpa
    Contains the persistence model and access objects.
  • Class
    Description
    MongoPreferencePersistenceAdapter
    A MongoPreferencePersistenceAdapter implements PreferencePersistencePort using MongoDB.
    PreferenceDocument
    A PreferenceDocument is the MongoDB document representation of a Preference.
    PreferenceDocumentMapper
    A PreferenceDocumentMapper maps between PreferenceDocument (MongoDB document) and Preference (domain model).
    PreferenceDocumentMapperImpl
     
    PreferenceDocumentRepository
    A PreferenceDocumentRepository is a Spring Data MongoDB repository that deals with PreferenceDocuments.
